snippet: Advocates of the labeling of genetically modified food vowed to carry their fight to other states and to the federal government after suffering a defeat in California.
abstract: Advocates of the labeling of genetically modified food vow to carry their fight to other states and to the federal government after suffering defeat in California; ballot measure that would have made California first state to require such labeling is defeated 53.1 percent to 46.9 percent.
lead_paragraph: Advocates of the labeling of genetically modified food vowed to carry their fight to other states and to the federal government after suffering a defeat in California.

headline.seo: After Loss, Fight to Label Modified Food Continues
headline.main: After Loss, the Fight to Label Modified Food Continues
headline.print_headline: After Loss, the Fight to Label Modified Food Continues
